item.title: The Best of Erlang User Conference 2016
item.description:
Videos from Erlang User Conference 2016 are up. Thank you to organizers for sharing them with the community.

As usual, I am publishing the talks, which I liked the most. Hope you’ll enjoy these too. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.

item.title: The Best of Strange Loop 2016
item.description: Strange Loop is one of my top 5 most beloved conferences. You can find all the 63 videos on YouTube. Again, thank you to organizers for sharing them. I think, I have found real gems for you guys. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.

item.title: On the importance of unification
item.description: Unification, for me, means having one way or instrument (not always the best) to deal with a problem. And, in some cases, it is crucial.

item.title: The Best of Erlang Factory SF Bay 2016
item.description: Annual Erlang Factory SF Bay Area 2016 conference ended only 3 weeks ago. There were many great speakers and presentations. What I specifically like about it, is that videos are available almost immediately. As usual, I am publishing the talks, which I liked the most. Hope you’ll enjoy these too. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.

item.title: Лучшие доклады fpconf 2015
item.description:
В прошлом году состоялась первая конференция, посвященная функциональному программированию - fpconf. Судя по рассказам моих знакомых, подобралась неплохая компания и было несколько действительно крутых докладов. К счастью, вам не надо смотреть все выложенные видео, чтобы найти те самые доклады.

Дисклеймер: выбранные материалы и степень их крутости отражают личное мнение автора. Ваше мнение может отличаться.

item.title: Еще немного про именование переменных
item.description: Вообще, после того, как вы прочитаете “Совершенный код” Стива Макконнелла, вопросов как назвать ту или иную переменную быть не должно. Но есть некоторые моменты, которые не освещены в книге и нуждаются в обсуждении.

item.title: The Best of RICON 2015
item.description: RICON is all about distributed systems. There are a lot of academic (Phd) talks and a few practical ones. I’ve chosen 3 out of 37 videos, which I liked the most. Hope you’ll enjoy these too. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.

item.title: The Best of Strange Loop 2015
item.description: Strange Loop is my top 5 “every year” conferences. There were many videos uploaded this year. Again, kudos to organizers for them. I think, I have found real gems for you guys. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.

item.title: The Best of Curry On 2015
item.description: If you haven’t heard, Curry On is a new conference (first time this year), which took place in Prague earlier in July. Despite its age, many good speakers happened to be there. Here is the list of my favorite talks. Disclaimer: your experience may vary.
